title: Ben Moxham
text:
Ben Moxham (born 9 June 2001) is an Irish <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> side <a href="Ulster%20Rugby">Ulster</a>. His preferred position is <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a> or <a href="Wing%20%28rugby%20union%29">wing</a>.
Ulster.
Moxham was named in the Ulster team to face <a href="Connacht%20Rugby">Connacht</a> in Round 9 of the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20Pro14">2020–21 Pro14</a>. He made his debut in the same fixture, coming on as a replacement.
On 24 December 2021, Ulster announced that Moxham's academy contract had been upgraded to a development contract.
